title: "UC Berkeley revokes recognition of 3 fraternities over hazing"
excerpt: "UC Berkeley revoked its official recognition of three fraternities in the past few weeks for “hazing-related activities,” officials said. The university’s chapters of Chi Phi and Theta Delta Chi had their recognized status stripped until January 2026."
